name: Mindless Scroll: an endless game about scrolling..
name_original: Mindless Scroll: an endless game about scrolling..
description:
Mindless Scroll: an endless game about scrolling

created on scratch

you know when you're supposed to be asleep, but instead you're scrolling through your phone, looking for literally anything else to do? well that's what this game is! so play it! or don't.. but it you do, just remember, once you start, y̵̫̓͐̅̂̃͠ò̷̪͈̣̦͉̺͕̇͠ų̶̙͂̕ ̴͈͍̩̓c̸̢̨̻̻̱͈͐͊͊̌̒̚͝a̷̢͔̗͇̝̪̠̰̽ṋ̸͍̭̪̯̹̫̼̬̈ṫ̴̠̙̮̙͚͌̀̏̀̉͜ ̶͖̎̎̃̀ǵ̵̠͂̚͘o̸̞̠̽̋̽͘ ̴̘̟̟͓̻̓̔̾̑̾̓͐h̵̜̟̰̠̲̥͚̾̍̈́͜ơ̶̤̫̥͍̬͇͖̪̤̓̾̏͘̕͘͝m̴͖͋̈͑̐̆̈́e̷̘̭͚̺̳̳͉͆̈͆̑̾
